mapper.select: select sum(CALL_NO) from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL WHERE CALL_DATE like CONCAT(#{callDate},'%')
select DEPARTMENT,sum(CALL_NO) as dptNum from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL WHERE CALL_DATE like CONCAT(#{callDate},'%') GROUP BY DEPARTMENT ORDER BY dptNum desc LIMIT 1
select BUSINESS_SENCE,sum(CALL_NO) as sumCallNo from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL WHERE CALL_DATE like CONCAT(#{callDate},'%') GROUP BY BUSINESS_SENCE ORDER BY sumCallNo DESC LIMIT 1
select BUSINESS_SENCE,sum(CALL_NO) as sumCallNo from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL WHERE CALL_DATE like CONCAT(#{callDate},'%') GROUP BY BUSINESS_SENCE ORDER BY sumCallNo LIMIT 1

select T1.BUSINESS_SENCE,T1.sumCallNo,(@rownum:=@rownum+1) as rownum from (select BUSINESS_SENCE,sum(CALL_NO) as sumCallNo from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL group by BUSINESS_SENCE ORDER BY sumCallNo DESC) as T1 ,(select @rownum:=0) as R

select T1.DEPARTMENT,T1.sumCallNo,(@rownum:=@rownum+1) as rownum from (select DEPARTMENT,sum(CALL_NO) as sumCallNo from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL group by DEPARTMENT ORDER BY sumCallNo DESC) as T1 ,(select @rownum:=0) as R
select BUSINESS_SENCE,sum(CALL_NO) as sumCallNo from T_APP_DAILY_INTERFACE_CALL WHERE CALL_DATE like CONCAT(#{callDate},'%') group by BUSINESS_SENCE
